tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE virtual_networks (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    cidr_block VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    provider VARCHAR(50),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE network_devices (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name STRING NOT NULL,
    device_type STRING,
    subnet_id UUID REFERENCES subnets (id),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS virtual_networks (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS subnets (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    subnet_cidr CIDR NOT NULL,
    network_id UUID REFERENCES virtual_networks(id),
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS instances (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    instance_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    subnet_id UUID REFERENCES subnets(id),
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS security_groups (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS rules (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    rule_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    security_group_id UUID REFERENCES security_groups(id),
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
);
